scripts.build: node generateIndex.js > index.html && node xslt/generateHandlebarTemplates.js --xmlDir=./data_model && handlebars templates > templates/template.js && webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build-dev: node generateIndex.js > index.html && node xslt/generateHandlebarTemplates.js --xmlDir=./data_model && handlebars templates > templates/template.js && webpack --config webpack.config.dev.js
